resources.string: A whitespace or linebreak gesture is required to register the current word.\n\nIMPORTANT: Make sure the line goes next from one edge to the other to be registered !

By Marcelo Morgade
morgade@gmail.com

Ratings and comments welcome at Google Play !
Append or restart note ? Restarting will delete ALL current content !
Learn more about how Dark Notes capture your text before change settings

A "gesture" means touching the screen with a finger/stylus and dragging it to draw something. The gesture ends when you take the finger/stylus off the screen. Using "Capture per gesture" mode, Dark Notes will register your draw as a letter each time a gesture ends. Remember to draw a whitespace gesture after the last letter of a word
Recommended for large screens. You draw a full word and Dark Notes will register it only when a whitespace or linebreak gesture is drawn over the word (as explained above)
You should learn and set your preferred word capture settings before starting your first note.\r\nView capture settings now ?
Enabling this option, will make Dark Notes register a word and whitespace every time a gesture ends at the right third of screen and a new one starts at the left third
Keep screen on (prevent lock) while capturing note

Recommended for multi-touch enabled devices. Keep holding a touch gesture with your left thumb and write with the right hand (invert if you are left handed !). Every time you take both hands off the screen, a word is registered (no whitespace gesture needed !). Do a 3 point touch on the screen to register a line break
Use both hands, hold touch and write
No text to share was typed
Note complete\nTap share icon at top bar to export
Select a note in the note list
Show visual hints for word detection mode when enabled
Tap the add icon at top bar to create a note
Tap the edit icon at top bar to write your note\nTap note title to edit its value
All visual feedback is disabled, navigation buttons are dimmed, screen kept on, but brightness set to minimum
This action can\'t be performed using an empty note
This device doesn\'t have a vibrator
Vibrate once per whitespace and twice per linebreak
Your device will briefly vibrate once when a word/whitespace is registered, and twice when a linebreak is registered. Your device must support vibration
Read Capture Help for more details on Word Detection
You still need to press the \'back\' button to finish capture

Dark Notes uses a letter-by-letter or word-by-word capture method instead of thinking the screen as a whole single page to be written. A page is rendered afterwards by the app, arranging letters/words in sequence
* Try different settings that best matches your handwriting
Release all touchs to register the linebreak
Release both touchs to register the word
Keep first touch pressed and use a second touch to write
Touch three points at same time to register a linebreak
Press and hold a point on screen to start writing a word
